About

I am a web developer: Ruby, JS, SQL. When not tinkering on the computer, I try to stay active and get outside.

Originally from Michigan. Now in Nashville.

Projects

  • Music reference project: Beyond Tabs
  • Fantasy football draft aid: Draft Baby

Law

Proud to say I passed the semi-infamous July 2012 Michigan Bar Exam. Now, I’m a “retired” lawyer.
